participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in fantasy worlds and struggles with reality.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys socializing and has a passion for music and performance.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. my favorite band is rascal flats. i'm a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three.

content.text: i have not heard of that before . i am trying to get into vet school
i am not sure . i am a very social person .
i like to play with my friends . do you have any hobbies ?
i have not tried that . but i do like to watch movies .
i am a huge gamer , my mom is a very good person .
